thread.title: Ethan Manville

author: Ethan Manville
title: Ethan Manville
text:
I bought a variety of flags and am completely satisfied with all.
Mardi Gras flags (tri-color) were the envy of the neighborhood! You just can't walk into a Wal-mart and get these. I had been looking for these particular flags for several years. Thank You American Flags!
Just today, I took a 200 mile trip along Interstate 10 at 70+ mph. My US windows flags took it, no problem! I even caught a few people giving a thumbs up sign.
From now on, I'll always check with American Flags first.
